data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Sun, Ping, Ji, Daode, Song, Weibo (2005): Notes on a new marine peritrichous ciliate (Ciliophora: Peritrichida), Zoothamnium xuianum n. sp., with redescription of Z. paraentzii Song, 1991 from northern China. Zootaxa 1075: 41-53, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.170316
